text: ABC has renewed “ Modern Family ” for two more seasons of 22 episodes each, TheWrap has learned. The hit family comedy has officially been renewed through Season 10, which will air in the 2018 - 19 season. The order will bring the series to a staggering total of 232 episodes. The news comes after months of negotiations between the network, producers 20th Century Fox Television and the cast, whose previous deals expired at the end of Season 8, though a renewal was likely always in the cards given the show ’ s success in the ratings.
